modified_sections: Added new import for useWorkoutHistory hook
Added workoutSavedRef to prevent duplicate workout saves
Created new useEffect for saving workout to history when complete

patterns_discovered: Using refs to track state that shouldn't trigger re-renders (workoutSavedRef)
Conditionally saving workout data with optional properties (weekKey, day)
Integrating custom hooks for feature-specific functionality (useWorkoutHistory)
gotchas_discovered: Need to prevent multiple saves of the same workout
Tracking workout completion requires checking specific step type
Rounding elapsed time to prevent potential floating-point issues
recommendations: Consider adding error handling for addWorkout method
Potentially add logging for workout completion events
Validate workout data before saving to history
